answers.answer: I've been having quite a bit of swelling in my left calf, ankle, and foot that has been occurring most of my pregnancy. I went to my checkup 2 days ago and mentioned it to my docter, he looked at my legs and and told me it is a very common problem. If you put more weight on one side of your body or if you sleep more on one side this can happen. You could mention it to your docter just to be sure but I'm sure there is nothing to worry about, I'm 33 weeks btw.
It's actually very common in pregnancy specially with this heat. If you have a way of checking your BP that would be idea
I called my doctor and left a message, Im just scare of preeclampsia because it happened to my cousin I guess I'm just being paranoid

I have the same problem with my right foot and ankle. My doctor told me that sometimes that can happen if the baby prefers one side of the stomach over the other side. My baby is always on the right, the side that swells. He told me to get in a pool at the end of the day or to elevate my feet above my heart. He also said as long as your skin color stays the same, not to worry. But if it turns purple or red, that is a cause for concern.

Oh ok thank u soo much i spoke to my doctor and she told me the same thing too as long as my skin don't change color im fine and yes baby likes my left side better now I know why that foot gets more swell

question: last night before bed I realized my feet were swollen especially my left one and today when I woke they were still a little swollen and as i sat down to eat breakfast my left foot randomly started getting swollen and tingly feeling under my feet I will be 17 weeks tomorrow is that normal or I need to see my doctor asap ?
title: Scared :(
